name: Obliterina
description:
Fight robots in an strange forest. Shoot your way through as a sci fi woman in this platformer game, inspired by the old classic Obliterator.

Short but sweet :)

Controls:

Left, right: arrow keys or "a" and "d"

Jump: up arrow or "w"

Shoot: space bar or ctrl

Exit to menu: Esc

Asset list included in zip file

Submission for the Shacknews Jam V
